title: Teman Book Club: Cozy Reads & Conversations
description: An evening of warm, low-pressure discussion around comfort reads. Newcomers welcome — small-group prompts and a buddy option available.

faqs.q: Do I need to read a book?
faqs.a: Bring any favorite or comfort read; no prep required.
Absolutely. We have buddy mentors to help you settle in.
Cozy, welcoming, and small-group conversations with gentle prompts.
